entry.title: Generate JSON from PostgreSQL
entry.summary: So, you have a postgresql production database with a slave instance being used for reports and ad-hoc queries. Every now and then you get the same kind of data requests, but for different customers, orders etc. Instead of sharing SQL templates to different users and getting them setup to query, it is very easy to make quick shell scripts that output JSON formatted data. Then, you can easily have your web developers build UI for search and display. Read on to install local database using docker, fill it up with sample data, script psql, then enhance it to wrap with JSONification and finally hooking up script to be an API. …
